articles.title: CCC refers Rockhampton COVID-19 nurse case back to health service - 9News

articles.title: The poorest Australians are twice as likely to die before age 75 as the richest, and the gap is widening - The Conversation AU
articles.description: There is a large and widening gap between the richest and poorest Australians in terms of risk of dying before the age of 75, according to a study tracking the trend from 2006-16.
